hotels.description: Experience the top notch service and sophisticated style at the Grand Sylhet Hotel & Resort, which is conveniently located within 5 minutes distance of Sylhet's Osmani International Airport. Our 5-star hotel is an ideal escape to Bangladesh for both business travellers and vacationing families. After exploring the city, return for our delightful dining options, including local to international fare and a chic rooftop restaurant. Challenge yourself to a workout in the fitness center or take a swim in the rooftop swimming pool, followed by a tranquil treatment at the Spa. If you are hosting an event in Sylhet, we offer 8,500 square feet of versatile, sophisticated venue space, including multiple meeting rooms and a ballroom that accommodates 550 guests. Luxury hotel rooms and suites showcase deluxe bedding and marble bathrooms, as well as high-speed internet, desks with ergonomic chairs and laptop- sized safes. Make your visit truly remarkable at Grand Sylhet Hotel & Resort.

hotels.location: Dargah Gate, Sylhet(20 sec from Shahjalal Majar Sharif)
hotels.description: Grand Mostafa Hotels Ltd. is a five-star Deluxe hotel, situated on the scenic shoreline of the Bay of Bengal, in Coxâ€™s Bazar, Bangladesh. With its impeccable service, stunning views, and luxurious amenities, Seagull is an ideal destination for travelers looking for a sanctuary of comfort and elegance.

hotels.location: Hotel Star Pacific East Dorgah Gate Sylhet.
hotels.description: Hotel Star Pacific has a fitness center, garden, a terrace and restaurant in Sylhet. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The hotel features an indoor pool and an ATM. The daily breakfast offers continental, American or Asian options. You can play ping pong at the hotel, and car rental is available. The nearest airport is Osmani International, 5 miles from Hotel Star Pacific, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Hotel Noorjahan Grand is a luxury hotel located in the heart of Sylhet city. With its contemporary design and modern amenities, it offers a comfortable and convenient stay for both business and leisure travelers. The hotel features spacious rooms, a rooftop restaurant with panoramic views, a fitness center, and conference facilities. Whether you're visiting Sylhet for business or pleasure, Hotel Noorjahan Grand ensures a memorable experience.

Rose View Hotel is a luxury hotel located in the heart of Sylhet city. With its elegant decor, modern amenities, and warm hospitality, it offers a comfortable and memorable stay for guests. The hotel features well-appointed rooms, a rooftop restaurant with stunning views of the city, a swimming pool, and banquet facilities. Whether you're visiting Sylhet for business or leisure, Rose View Hotel ensures a delightful experience.

Britannia Hotel is a boutique hotel located in the heart of Sylhet city. With its elegant design, comfortable rooms, and personalized service, it offers a memorable stay for guests. The hotel features well-appointed rooms, a restaurant serving delicious cuisine, and a rooftop terrace with panoramic views of the city. Whether you're visiting Sylhet for business or leisure, Britannia Hotel ensures a delightful experience.

Fortune Garden Resort is a tranquil retreat located on the outskirts of Sylhet city. Surrounded by lush greenery, it offers a peaceful escape from the hustle and bustle of urban life. The resort features comfortable cottages, a swimming pool, and a restaurant serving local and international cuisine. Whether you're looking for a relaxing getaway or an adventurous holiday, Fortune Garden Resort is the perfect choice.

Seagull Hotel Cox's Bazar, standing on the beach of the world's longest sea beach Cox's Bazar offering you the very best facilities and services. Whether you are planning for a family holiday or a business trip, Seagull Hotel Cox's Bazar is your ultimate choice. Each of our 182 well-decorated rooms has its own balcony offering guests a breathtaking view of the Bay of Bengal. Equipped with modern amenities, our rooms ensure that your stay is comfortable and enjoyable. Our multi-cuisine restaurant serves delicious food from around the world.

hotels.location: 14 Kalatoli Road, Hotel Motel Zone, Cox's Bazar
hotels.description: Long Beach Hotel Cox's Bazar is one of the leading luxury hotels in Cox's Bazar. We are committed to providing our guests with the highest standard of hospitality and service. Our spacious and well-appointed rooms offer stunning views of the Bay of Bengal, while our world-class facilities ensure a comfortable and enjoyable stay. Whether you're here for business or leisure, we guarantee an unforgettable experience.

hotels.hotel_name: Royal Tulip Sea Pearl Beach Resort & Spa
hotels.description: Escape to paradise at Royal Tulip Sea Pearl Beach Resort & Spa, a luxurious beachfront resort in Cox's Bazar. Situated on the pristine sands of Inani Beach, our resort offers a tranquil retreat surrounded by natural beauty. Relax in spacious rooms and suites with modern amenities and breathtaking views of the Bay of Bengal. Indulge in delectable cuisine at our restaurants, rejuvenate your senses at our spa, and host unforgettable events in our versatile venues. Whether you're seeking a romantic getaway, a family vacation, or a destination wedding, our resort provides the perfect setting for unforgettable experiences.

hotels.location: Marine Drive Road, Kolatoli Beach, Cox's Bazar
hotels.description: Experience luxury and comfort at Sayeman Beach Resort, Cox's Bazar. Our beachfront resort offers spacious rooms, exquisite dining options, and a range of recreational activities for guests of all ages. Whether you're seeking a relaxing getaway or an adventure-filled vacation, Sayeman Beach Resort provides the perfect setting for memorable experiences.

hotels.location: Plot 7, Road 2, Hotel Motel Zone, Cox's Bazar
hotels.description: Hotel The Cox Today is a luxury hotel located in the heart of Cox's Bazar. With its elegant design, modern amenities, and warm hospitality, it offers a comfortable and memorable stay for guests. The hotel features well-appointed rooms, a rooftop restaurant with panoramic views of the Bay of Bengal, a swimming pool, and conference facilities. Whether you're visiting Cox's Bazar for business or leisure, Hotel The Cox Today ensures a delightful experience.

Escape to paradise at Coral Blue Resort, Saint Martin. Located on the serene shores of West Beach, our resort offers a tranquil retreat surrounded by natural beauty. Relax in spacious rooms and suites with modern amenities and stunning views of the Andaman Sea. Indulge in delicious cuisine at our restaurant, take a refreshing dip in our swimming pool, or simply unwind on the beach with a tropical cocktail in hand. Whether you're seeking a romantic getaway or a family vacation, Coral Blue Resort promises an unforgettable experience.

Bay Vista Resort is a beachfront retreat located on East Beach, Saint Martin. With its stunning views, comfortable accommodations, and warm hospitality, it offers a relaxing getaway for guests. The resort features well-appointed rooms, a restaurant serving delicious cuisine, and a range of recreational activities for guests of all ages. Whether you're looking to relax on the beach, explore the island's natural beauty, or enjoy water sports, Bay Vista Resort has something for everyone.

Discover a world of luxury and tranquility at Ocean Paradise Hotel & Resort, Saint Martin. Nestled on the pristine shores of South Beach, our resort offers breathtaking views of the Andaman Sea and lush tropical gardens. Indulge in spacious rooms and suites with modern amenities, dine on exquisite cuisine at our restaurants, and rejuvenate your senses at our spa. Whether you're seeking a romantic getaway, a family vacation, or a destination wedding, Ocean Paradise Hotel & Resort provides the perfect setting for unforgettable experiences.

Hotel Sea Crown is a charming beachfront hotel located on South Beach, Saint Martin. With its serene surroundings, comfortable accommodations, and personalized service, it offers a relaxing escape for guests. The hotel features cozy rooms, a rooftop restaurant with panoramic views of the ocean, and a range of recreational activities for guests of all ages. Whether you're looking to unwind on the beach, explore the island's attractions, or simply relax and rejuvenate, Hotel Sea Crown is the perfect choice for your Saint Martin getaway.

Escape to paradise at Blue Marine Resort, a serene beachfront retreat located on North Beach, Saint Martin. Surrounded by crystal-clear waters and lush tropical gardens, our resort offers a tranquil setting for relaxation and rejuvenation. Indulge in luxurious accommodations, savor delicious cuisine at our restaurants, and unwind with a variety of recreational activities. Whether you're seeking a romantic getaway or a family vacation, Blue Marine Resort provides the perfect blend of comfort, luxury, and natural beauty.

Parjatan Hotel Rangamati is situated on the picturesque banks of the beautiful Kaptai Lake in Rangamati, Chittagong Hill Tracts. Surrounded by lush greenery and tranquil waters, our hotel offers a peaceful retreat for guests seeking relaxation and natural beauty. Our comfortable rooms provide stunning views of the lake and hills, while our restaurant serves delicious local and international cuisine. Whether you're here for business or leisure, Parjatan Hotel Rangamati promises a memorable stay.

Our comfortable cottages provide stunning views of the surrounding landscape, while our restaurant serves delicious local and international cuisine. Whether you're exploring the area's natural attractions or simply relaxing by the pool, Hill Top Resort Rangamati ensures a memorable stay.

Our rooms are well-appointed with modern amenities, and our restaurant serves delicious local and international cuisine. Whether you're exploring the area's natural attractions or simply relaxing on our terrace overlooking the lake, Sufia Hotel & Rest House provides the perfect setting for a memorable stay.

Located amidst the picturesque surroundings of Manali, The Manali Inn offers luxurious accommodations with stunning views of the mountains. Enjoy world-class amenities and warm hospitality.
Nestled in the serene Solang Valley, Solang Valley Resort offers comfortable accommodations surrounded by snow-capped mountains. Experience adventure activities and relax in natural beauty.
Experience luxury and tranquility at Apple Country Resort, situated in the heart of Manali. Enjoy comfortable rooms, delectable cuisine, and panoramic views of the surrounding valleys.
Perched on the banks of Beas River, The Himalayan offers luxurious accommodations with traditional Himachali hospitality. Enjoy breathtaking views and personalized service.
